Package gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BtnEnterManager
    Component class to setup the enter butter for gui
    CLImanager
    Component class to setup the command line interface for gui
    ClockAndDateManager
    Component class to setup the date and time display for gui
    CommandHandler
    Utility class to interface between GUI and Logic, to pass user input from GUI to Logic and display results from logic to user via the GUI.
    CommandHistory
    Utility class to allow UNIX like command history, get previous or get next command from history
    FeedbackManager
    Component class to setup the feedback for gui
    GUISize
    Master List of all the size and cood for GUI
    HelplistPopup
    Utility class to create a popup and display helplist
    HotkeyHintManager
    Component class to setup the Hotkey hint for gui
    ImageGetter
    Utility class to load image files from resourcepath
    MainController  
    QuoteLib
    Utility class to load motivational quotes from resourcepath
    QuoteViewerManager
    Component class to setup the QuoteViewer for gui
    StatsPopup
    Utility class to create a popup and display Statistics
    SWTResourceManager
    Utility class for managing OS resources associated with SWT controls such as colors, fonts, images, etc.
    TableManager  
    TablerLoader  
    TextToAppointment
    Dependency injection for storage for op2 to load table from text file
    TrayIconManager
